title: Reconnecting to a game (new client)
body: Has anyone else had an issue in which, they try to reconnect to a game in progress but the client won't let them. My client says  "Game is still in progress", but gives no option to reconnect. I have tried to restart the client multiple times, but the message will not change.  This continued even after the game finished. Does anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body:
If you get disconnected from a match and the reconnect button won't work, there might be something blocking your network from reaching our servers again for some reason. 

Switching to a wired connection might help, but let's also go over all the steps in the [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover all our bases.
